subject: RE: [junit] testing XML APIs
msgSnippet: In case you are interested in testing XML generated by your Java applications, I can recommend XmlUnit.  It compare a given XML against an expected XML.

In case you are interested in testing XML generated by your Java
applications, I can recommend XmlUnit.  It compare a given XML against
an expected XML.

 

Andreas
